nealrichardson commented on PR #13122:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13122#issuecomment-1124265334

   Appveyor failure looks like something with gtest, so unrelated. The other Windows failure is https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/6393577373?check_suite_focus=true#step:7:1065, not sure what that's about. https://github.com/apache/thrift/blame/master/build/cmake/DefinePlatformSpecifc.cmake#L67 mentions this lib, and https://github.com/apache/thrift/commit/7f9abb1cc0f4b2793a48f45ddfcf0d2b287cc50c is the only change to this file since 0.13, so I'm guessing the issue is elsewhere.
   
   If we can resolve this and want to move forward, we should of course run all of the nightlies to check for more issues.

kou commented on code in PR #13122:

##########
cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:
##########
@@ -1348,21 +1348,22 @@ macro(build_thrift)
       ${EP_COMMON_CMAKE_ARGS}
       "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${THRIFT_PREFIX}"
       "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH=${THRIFT_PREFIX}/lib"
+      # Work around https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/issues/18865
+      -DBoost_NO_BOOST_CMAKE=ON
       -DBUILD_COMPILER=OFF
+      -DBUILD_EXAMPLES=OFF
       -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF
       -DBUILD_TESTING=OFF
-      -DBUILD_EXAMPLES=OFF
       -DBUILD_TUTORIALS=OFF
-      -DWITH_QT4=OFF

Review Comment:
   Could you add `-DWITH_QT5=OFF` instead?
